data.message: Yo slim ya boy from atl yo forget drake it's funny how he can out being a rnb type dude then he signs with ymcm and now he's hard you've been doing this forever lay back chill love your daughter spend time with her and stop even thinking about drake while this a probably a money making strategy I would rather here a new old style album take it back to your roots everybody shit sounds the same these days I promise it would sale just because you talk about drugs and how messed up you are doesn't mean you have to be hell the main reason I started to listen to u was that I could relate to the situations you tales about and that's what sales I'm pushing forty and talking about syrup and ass and making it rain is so old so I know it doesn't make much for my opinion but think about Stan and what he thinks stay up I'll always be one of you're number one fans
